Main pronunciation 主要发音: chàng

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning an elongated pointed tablet of jade held in the hands by ancient rulers on ceremonial occasions

Shuowen 说文解字: 圭尺二寸有瓚以祠宗廟者也從王昜聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 瑒 from (rem- 王 wáng) from jade 玉 yù and phonetic sundial (𠃓)昜 yáng simp 玚.

瑒字的基本解释

瑒
chàng

瑒
yáng
均见“玚”。

瑒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chàng］
［《廣韻》徒杏切，上梗，澄。］
“玚1”的繁体字。
圭璧名。即鬯圭。
[②]［dàng］
［《集韻》待朗切，上蕩，定。］
“玚2”的繁体字。通“璗1”。
黄金。参见“瑒2琫”。
[③]［yáng］
［《廣韻》與章切，平陽，以。］
“玚3”的繁体字。
(1)玉名。
(2)人名用字。汉代有应瑒。见《後汉书·应奉传》、《三国志·魏志·应瑒传》。

瑒字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瑒； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页737第12
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】丑亮切【正韻】尺亮切，?音悵。【說文】圭尺二寸有瓚，以祠宗廟者。【徐曰】瓚亦杓也。　又通作鬯。【周語】奉玉鬯往獻。【註】鬯酒之圭，長尺二寸，有瓚，所以灌地降神之器。　又【廣韻】徒杏切【集韻】丈梗切【韻會】杖梃切【正韻】杖梗切，?音挺。義同。　又【集韻】待朗切【正韻】徒黨切，?音蕩。【前漢·王莽傳】瑒琫瑒珌。【註】瑒，音蕩。玉名也。　又【廣韻】與章切【集韻】【韻會】余章切，?音陽。義同。　又人名。【曹丕·典論論文】汝南應瑒德璉。又唐有申屠瑒。 考證：〔【周語】玉鬯往獻。〕　謹照原文玉字上增奉字。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　瑒; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 737 12
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Ugly bright cut [Zheng Yun] ruler bright cut, sound melancholy. [Said the text] There is a Zan in two inches of Gui Chi, who is based on an ancestral temple. [Xu Yue] Zan and Dipper.　It's all over again. 【Zhou Yu】Feng Yushan to offer. [Note] The Kyu of Shanjiu is two inches long and has a chan, so it is a tool for drenching the earth.　 [Guang Yun] Tu Xing cut [Ji Yun] Zhang stalk cut [Yun Hui] Stick stalk cut [Zheng Yun] stick stalk cut, the sound is pretty. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Waiting for Langqie [Zhengyun] to cut the party, and the sound fluctuates. [Previous Han·Wang Mang's Biography] Rongrong. 【Note】Yuan, the sound oscillates. Yuming also.　 [Guang Yun] and Zhang Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Yu Zhang Qi,? Yin Yang. The same meaning.　Another name. 【Cao Pi·Dianlun Essay】Runan Yingzhen Delian. There is also Shen Tuyun in the Tang Dynasty. Textual research: [[Zhou Yu] Yuchang Xiangxian. 〕　I would like to add the word "Feng" to the original jade word.
